extend ≈ PIE *ten- (“to stretch”). Ancient Greek τείνω (teínō) extend, strain Sanskrit तनोति (tanóti) extend, continue Old English þennan dehnen … : thrust control Persian تنیدن (tanidan, “to weave”) <> tennon tendon ≈ tant (“string of a musical instrument”) ≠ taunt < tempt <> cut
